item.title: [Basic] Postgres Commands (EN)
item.description: access to DB 1 psql postgresql://{username}:{password}@{host}:{port}/{database_name} get database list & choice database 1 2 \l \c {database_name} get table list 1 \dt get table information 1 \d {table_name} exit 1 \q

item.title: [Basic] Postgres Commands (KR)
item.description: DB 접속 1 psql postgresql://{username}:{password}@{host}:{port}/{database_name} get database list & choice database 1 2 \l \c {database_name} get table list 1 \dt get table information 1 \d {table_name} exit 1 \q
